item.title: Setup Active Directory Lab
item.description: Table of Contents Install Vagrant Spin up machines using Vagrant Machine-A - Active Directory Domain Controller Machine-B - Windows 10 desktop joined to domain Execute the scripts Results Machine-A Machine-B Reference This post will share the details on configuring an Active Directory lab for threat hunting. We will use a popular tool called “Vagrant” to provision the machines through automation. This post is part-1 of the Auror Project which is hosted by Sudarshan Pisupati
